storage

Class StorageFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.StorageFacade

  • public class StorageFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Fernet Storage Facade fa uso del pattern Facade e fornisce dei metodi per trasformare/Estrarre oggetti permanenti in istanze java
